finnmath.util

Class SquareRootCalculator

  • Object
    • SquareRootCalculator

  • @Beta
public final class SquareRootCalculator
extends Object
    An implementation for calculating square roots of BigIntegers and BigDecimals
    Since:
    1

        Returns the square root of the given BigInteger
        Parameters:
        integer - the integer whose square root is to be calculated
        Returns:
        The square root of the given integer
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if integer == null
        IllegalArgumentException - if integer < 0
        Since:
        1

      • sqrt

        public static BigDecimal sqrt(BigInteger integer,
                              BigDecimal precision)
        Returns the square root of the given BigInteger
        Parameters:
        integer - the integer whose square root is to be calculated
        precision - the precision for the termination condition
        Returns:
        The square root of the given integer
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if integer == null
        NullPointerException - if precision == null
        IllegalArgumentException - if integer < 0
        IllegalArgumentException - if precision <= 0 || 1 <= precision
        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        sqrt(BigDecimal, BigDecimal, int, int)

      • sqrt

        public static BigDecimal sqrt(BigInteger integer,
                              int scale,
                              int roundingMode)
        Returns the square root of the given BigInteger
        Parameters:
        integer - the integer whose square root is to be calculated
        scale - the scale to be set on the result
        roundingMode - the rounding mode to be used during the setting of the scale of the result
        Returns:
        The square root of the given integer
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if integer == null
        IllegalArgumentException - if integer < 0
        IllegalArgumentException - if scale < 0
        IllegalArgumentException - if roundingMode < 0 || 7 < roundingMode
        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        sqrt(BigDecimal, BigDecimal, int, int), BigDecimal.setScale(int, int)

                              BigDecimal precision,
                              int scale,
                              int roundingMode)

      • sqrtOfPerfectSquare

        public static BigInteger sqrtOfPerfectSquare(BigInteger integer)
        Returns the square root of the given BigInteger which has to be a perfect square
        Parameters:
        integer - the perfect square whose square root is to be calculated
        Returns:
        The square root of the given perfect square
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if integer == null
        IllegalArgumentException - if integer < 0
        IllegalArgumentException - if !perfectSquare
        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        perfectSquare(java.math.BigInteger), BigIntegerMath.sqrt(java.math.BigInteger, java.math.RoundingMode)

      • perfectSquare

        public static boolean perfectSquare(BigInteger integer)
        Returns if the given BigInteger is a perfect square
        Parameters:
        integer - the integer which should be checked
        Returns:
        true if the integer is a perfect square, false otherwise
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if integer == null
        IllegalArgumentException - if integer < 0
        Since:
        1
